title: Tactical decision  summoner ` Lux fan art
body:
Hi guy thank you for your time :D
Please comment below if you want to! I'd like to get critique/suggestions

replies.body: I'm not sure what's brought on the sudden inf**lux** of Lux artwork, but I'm a huge fan!  Beautifully done! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=fnAjZtEU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-10T19:24:07.370+0000)
>
> I'm not sure what's brought on the sudden inf**lux** of Lux artwork, but I'm a huge fan!  Beautifully done! ^-^

Thank you so much!!  <3 <3
